original_text: At the time that God chooses, the king will attack the south again. This time the result will be different from the first time.
korean_text: 작정된 기한에 그가 다시 나와서 남방에 이를 것이나 이번이 그 전번만 못하리니

sentences.original_text: At the time that God chooses
the king will attack the south again
will be different from the first time
